column1: @entity0 was getting ready for the weekend.  He needed to go to the store.  He needed to get food for his friend's birthday party.  @entity0 made a list of things to get.  He wrote down strawberries, apples, cupcakes, juice, and bananas.  @entity0 was going to make a fruit salad.  @entity0 went to the store.  He bought the apples, cupcakes, and bananas that were on the shopping list.  He forgot to buy the juice.   @entity0 also bought a toy mouse for a present for his friend.  @entity0 was very excited for the party this weekend.   The day of the party finally arrived.  @entity0 made the fruit salad with the apples, strawberries, and bananas he bought.  He set out the cupcakes and fruit salad on the table.  He placed the toy mouse in shiny paper and set it on the table too.  He checked his watch.  It was almost time for the party.  The birthday guests would be there soon. Once the guests came they ate cupcakes and fruit salad.  @entity1 liked the food.  @entity0 gave his friend the present.  His friend really liked the toy mouse.  @entity0 was very happy because his friend had a great birthday.
@placeholder did @entity0 need to go to the store
he needed to get food for his friend's birthday party.
he needed to get food for his friend's birthday party.
